attributes.action: Update Covid-19 Symptoms thoroughly for adults and children within NHS & beyond
attributes.additional_details: Many Universities have done amazing work in gathering information, but this hasn't been uploaded to the NHS. Help us fight appropriately, so each & every individual can be versed in what to look out for and know how best to respond. There's so much confusion created by misinformation & if symptoms were displayed fully, it could not only prevent transmission, prevent Long-Covid but ultimately save lives. This needs to include reinfection risks & symptom information of new #B1351 variant.
attributes.background: It's time everyone realised what to look out for when it comes to recognising all the symptoms of Covid-19. In order to limit transmission & to keep eachother safe, we need a thorough breakdown of symptoms to be displayed on NHS sites & all professional bodies. To be forewarned is forearmed.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/555257
